frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-advanced-alttab-window-switcher
frozen.shortDescription: Highly customizable replacement for the Alt-Tab window/app switchers that offers 'type to search' mode, various filtering and sorting options, workspace and monitor navigation, VIM navigation hotkeys, window control and an app launcher.
frozen.longDescription:
Highly customizable replacement for the Alt-Tab window/app switchers that offers 'type to search' mode, various filtering and sorting options, workspace and monitor navigation, VIM navigation hotkeys, window control and an app launcher.
AATWS is compatible with Custom Hot Corners - Extended extension, allows to configure any mouse button and scroll wheel and can be used as a mouse controlled dock.

Note that GNOME has 3 built-in window switcher popups and this extension replaces all of them. The first one is grouping windows by applications and is used as default in vanilla GNOME distributions. The second one offers window list and the third one windows of currently focused application. You can set keyboard shortcuts for all the switchers in the Gnome Settings.

Follow the link below for more information and bug reports.

Keywords: alttab, search, find, windows, popup delay, applications, apps, dock, monitor, thumbnail, preview, move windows, launch app, switch windows
